thread.section_title: Orchard Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect budget option
thread.title_full: Perfect budget option - Review of Orchard Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marja M
title: Perfect budget option
text: We stayed for a week in a tiny room on the ninth floor, but it really was all we needed, since we spent the days outside and only slept at the hotel. The room was tidy, the aircon/heat worked well, the shower was warm, and the window view totally made up for the small room. The location is great for exploring both Manhattan and Brooklyn as several subway lines as close by. The neighbourhood itself is also full of hip restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, galleries and museums. We definitely recommend this!
